attributes.action: have a Michael Jackson day(25th June preferably)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: let`s give something back to micheal jackson and have 1 day a year, where we celebrate as a country what micheal jackson did for us all. he was the biggest giver to charity the world has ever seen. he has touched more lives around the world than any other person on this planet. the world will never see another micheal jackson. you want to give us some more bank holidays, so here`s your chance. make history by announcing our new micheal jackson day

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
